1.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Rachel is still looking out the window as Joey enters.

lines.Line:
(sees Rachel) Oh, uh, hey Rach. I uh, I was just coming over here to
uh… Oh wait, I don’t have to lie to you, you don’t live here anymore. Uh,
I’m eating their food. What are you doing

Ross is on a date with my sister and they shut the drapes two and
a-half-hours ago
Whoa, I didn’t know we could date your sister

lines.Character:
(Chandler and Monica enter from their room and Joey quickly hides the bag of potato
chips behind his back
lines.Line:
Chandler and Monica enter from their room and Joey quickly hides the bag of potato
chips behind his back.
Joey we know you steal our food
Joey we know you steal our food
Joey we know you steal our food
Joey offers them some potato chips.
(To Rachel) Oh, are the drapes still closed hon

Yeah. And y’know who should’ve shut their drapes? Is that
perverted old couple two doors over

I can’t believe Ross went out with Rachel’s sister! When
Chandler made out with my sister I was mad at him for 10 years

2.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Chandler, Monica, Phoebe, and Joey are watching ET.

lines.Character: (We see the TV and it’s the last scene where ET is saying goodbye
lines.Line: We see the TV and it’s the last scene where ET is saying goodbye.
Oh y’know what’s sadder than this? Bambi. I cried for three days with that movie. No wait two! Because on the third day my mother killed herself so I was partly crying for that
(totally not crying) Well see now that I can see crying over, but Bambi is a cartoon
(crying) You didn’t cry when Bambi’s mother died
(crying) You didn’t cry when Bambi’s mother died
Yes it was very sad when the guy stopped drawing the deer

Chandler there’s nothing wrong with crying! I mean you don’t
have to be so macho all the time
Yeah you’re right. I don’t know what I was thinking

No, I guess I just never really cried. Y’know? I’m not a
crying kind of guy

Come on man there’s gotta be something that gets you choked up! Like
uh, uh oh, what if you saw a three-legged puppy
I’d be sad sure, but I wouldn’t cry
I’d be sad sure, but I wouldn’t cry

Okay, what if the puppy said, "Help me Chandler. All the other
puppies pick on me.
Cry?! I just found a talking puppy, I’m rich
Cry?! I just found a talking puppy, I’m rich

Oh, I’ve got it! I have got it! (Gets up and gets something from
the dresser underneath the TV.) Pictures from your childhood. This will get you going
good
Chandler starts paging through the album.
Chandler starts paging through the album.
All right, what’s going on there? (Points to a picture.

Oh, that’s Parent’s Day, first grade. That’s me with
the janitor Martin
Oh they didn’t want to come
So that story doesn’t make you cry
No! Look, I don’t cry! It’s not a big deal! Okay?

No! It’s not okay! It’s not okay at all!! You’re dead
inside!

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, time lapse, Rachel is at the counter as Jill enters.

lines.Line:
You’ll never believe what just happened, Ross just totally blew me
off and he didn’t even tell me why

Ohhh well. Y’know what honey? The best thing to do to get over a
guy is to start dating someone else. Oh! There is this great guy you will love at work
named Bob! He’s a real up-and-comer in Human Resources

Y’know, thanks for trying to cheer me up, but I’m not gonna date
some random guy from your work

It’s probably because not mature enough. Or smart enough. Maybe he
doesn’t like the way I dress—No that can’t be it. It’s really gotta be
the smart thing. Oh I’m so stupid! I’m just like this incredibly pretty
stupid girl

No honey, okay, okay, you wanna know why Ross canceled the date? Because
I asked him to
Because you are my sister and Ross and I have this huge history
I don’t understand, do you want to go out with Ross
You don’t want him, but you don’t want me to have him
(changing the subject) Y’know Bob in Human Resources

Ugh! I cannot believe you did this too me! You had me doubting how smart I
was! (Gasps) You had me doubting my fashion sense

Look, this is not that big of a deal! You just don’t date Ross!
There’s a million other guys out there, you just
Hey! You have no right to tell me what to do
Hey! You have no right to tell me what to do
Hey! You have no right to tell me what to do

I’m not telling you what to do! I am telling you what not to
do
Why are you so jealous of me
Why are you so jealous of me

Jill this is not about me being jealous of you! This is about you being
a brat! Wanting what you can’t have

Can’t have?! Excuse me, the only thing I can’t have is dairy!
(Starts to storm out.
All right, all right, well you just blew your chances at dating Bob
All right, all right, well you just blew your chances at dating Bob

4.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, Chandler is reading Chicken Soup for the Soul as Monica enters.

lines.Line:
Hey! (He quickly tries to hide the book by throwing it under the
couch, only the couch has no back and it slides into the kitchen.
(picking up the book) Chicken Soup for the Soul?
There’s no back to this couch
There’s no back to this couch
Why are you reading this? You hate this kind of stuff

Yeah I know, but I figured a shot y’know? Maybe one of those
stories would make me cry and then you wouldn’t think I was y’know, all dead
inside

Oh that’s so sweet! Look Chandler I don’t care if you
can’t cry, I love you

Oh that’s so sweet! Look Chandler I don’t care if you
can’t cry, I love you
Oh that makes me feel so warm in my hollow tin chest

No, I mean, come on, seriously think about it, we get married,
we’re up at the altar and I’m like this. (Makes a bored face.

I won’t care, because I know you will be feeling it all in here.
(Points to her heart.

Yeah! And if, and if we have a baby one-day, and the doctor hands it to
you in the delivery room and you don’t cry, so what! And-and-and, and if we take him
to college and come home and see his empty room for the first time, and you got nothing,
it won’t matter to me
Okay, well I won’t uh, worry about this anymore then

And-and-and if I die, from a long illness. And you’re writing out
my eulogy and you open a desk drawer and you find a note from me that says, "I will
always be with you," and you still can’t shed one tiny tear, I know you’ll
be crying a river inside

What?! You can’t shed a tear for your dead wife!! Now, I left you a
note from the beyond
So you didn’t mean any of that?
So you didn’t mean any of that?

5.SceneDescription:
Ursula’s apartment, Phoebe is going to confront her twin about her new
porn career.

lines.Character: (Ursula opens the door and is all dressed up with big hair and lingerie
lines.Line: Ursula opens the door and is all dressed up with big hair and lingerie.
(seeing her dress) Oh God. So-so you’re making porn movies
Someone calls out from her apartment.
Yeah, can I help you with something
Look, I’m talking right now! You’re—you mean her
Y’know, twin stuff is always a real big seller
Yeah, I can talk them into giving you like, 30 dollars

No!! No way! No! And stop using my name! And shame on you! (Yells into
the apartment) And shame on all of you! You’re disgusting! Especially you (points to
someone) with that! (Storms away.

6.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is reading a paper as Phoebe enters.

lines.Line: So, I just came from the company Ursula works for

No! No! I just went to pick up Phoebe Buffay’s checks; there were a
lot of them

Um-mmm, and I won’t have to go there anymore because I gave
them my correct address

That’s great, but isn’t it gonna bother that people still think
you’re a porn star
Oh no! No! I know how to handle it
Oh no! No! I know how to handle it

Yeah. (She notices some guy putting a coat on his girlfriend is trying
to remember where he’s seen her before.) (To him) You’re trying to figure out
where you know me from? All right, I’ll give you a hint. From porn! Okay? (He tries
to rush his girlfriend out.) Yeah your pervert boyfriend watched me in a porno movie! (To
Joey) See

7.SceneDescription: Central Perk, everyone is there as Jill enters.

lines.Line:
All right, I’m leaving! Because I’m not going to spend one more
day with someone whose out to sabotage my every move. That’s you Rachel
(To Ross) And you! I throw myself at you and you say no, how gay are you

(starts crying) I-I can’t believe Jill’s gone. (They all
look at him.) I can’t help it, I opened a gate
